data.name: MacroExecMode
desc: Specify whether a macro can be executed.

items.name: NEVER_EXECUTE
lines: A macro should not be executed at all.

items.name: FROM_LIST
lines: Execute macros from secure list quietly.
If a macro is not in the list a confirmation for it executing will appear.

items.name: ALWAYS_EXECUTE
lines: Execute any macro, macros signed with trusted certificates and macros from secure list are executed quietly.
If the macro is neither in secure list nor signed a conformation will be requested.

items.name: USE_CONFIG
lines: Use configuration to retrieve macro settings.
In case a user confirmation is required a dialog is output.

items.name: ALWAYS_EXECUTE_NO_WARN
lines: A macro should be executed always no conformation should be provided.

items.name: USE_CONFIG_REJECT_CONFIRMATION
lines: Use configuration to retrieve macro settings.
Treat cases when user confirmation required as rejected.

items.name: USE_CONFIG_APPROVE_CONFIRMATION
lines: Use configuration to retrieve macro settings.
Treat cases when user confirmation required as approved.

items.name: FROM_LIST_NO_WARN
lines: Execute only macros from secure list.
Macros that are not from the list are not executed.

items.name: FROM_LIST_AND_SIGNED_WARN
lines: Execute only macros from secure list or macros that are signed by trusted certificates.
If the macro is neither in secure list nor signed it will not be executed.
If the macro is signed with unknown certificate a warning will appear. The macro either will not be executed or if the warning allows conformation, it will be executed after user agrees.

items.name: FROM_LIST_AND_SIGNED_NO_WARN
lines: Execute only macros from secure list or macros that are signed by trusted certificates.
